IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: HOLY FAMILY CRISTO REY CATHOLIC HIGH SCHOOL IN BIRMINGHAM, ALABAMA COMBINES ACADEMIC RIGOR AND A CORPORATE WORK-STUDY PROGRAM TO EMPOWER STUDENTS FROM ECONOMICALLY CHALLENGED COMMUNITIES TO GRADUATE HIGH SCHOOL PREPARED TO PERSIST IN COLLEGE AND FLOURISH IN LIFE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: HOLY FAMILY CRISTO REY CATHOLIC HIGH SCHOOL IN BIRMINGHAM, ALABAMA COMBINES ACADEMIC RIGOR AND A CORPORATE WORK-STUDY PROGRAM TO EMPOWER STUDENTS FROM ECONOMICALLY CHALLENGED COMMUNITIES TO GRADUATE HIGH SCHOOL PREPARED TO PERSIST IN COLLEGE AND FLOURISH IN LIFE.
IRS990.Desc: SCHOOL - THE SCHOOL OPENED ITS DOORS IN A NEW LOCATION ON AUGUST 8, 2020. THIS NEW LOCATION WAS FUNDED BY A CAPITAL CAMPAIGN THAT BEGAN IN FY 2019. HOLY FAMILY CRISTO REY IS A COLLEGE PREPARATORY SCHOOL FOR STUDENTS FROM FINANCIALLY DISADVANTAGED BACKGROUNDS. THE SCHOOL HAD 181 STUDENTS THAT COMPLETED THE SCHOOL YEAR. THE SCHOOL IS FUNDED BY DONATIONS, SCHOLARSHIP GRANTING ORGANIZATION SCHOLARSHIPS TO STUDENTS AND A CORPORATE WORK STUDY PARTNERSHIP WITH ITS SISTER COMPANY, CRISTO REY BIRMINGHAM WORK STUDY.

OtherLiabilitiesOrgGrp.Desc: OTHER ACCRUED LIABILITIES - OTHER THAN PAYROLL

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL IS ORGANIZED AS A NOT-FOR-PROFIT CORPORATION UNDER THE ALABAMA NONPROFIT CORPORATION ACT. THE UNITED STATES CONFERENCE OF CATHOLIC BISHOPS RECEIVED A LETTER DATED AUGUST 21, 2019, WHICH STATES THAT THE AGENCIES, INSTRUMENTALITIES, EDUCATIONAL, CHARITABLE AND RELIGIOUS INSTITUTIONS OPERATED, SUPERVISED OR CONTROLLED BY OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE ROMAN CATHOLIC CHURCH IN THE UNITED STATES, ITS TERRITORIES OR POSSESSIONS APPEARING IN THE OFFICIAL CATHOLIC DIRECTORY ARE EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. THE SCHOOL IS LISTED IN THE 2021, 2020, 2019, AND 2018 EDITIONS OF THE OFFICIAL CATHOLIC DIRECTORY AND IS THEREFORE EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME AND UNEMPLOYMENT TAXES. THE SCHOOL IS SUBJECT TO UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME TAX (UBIT) ONLY IF IT ENGAGES IN ACTIVITIES SUBJECT TO THE UBIT REGULATIONS. TAX POSITIONS ARE INITIALLY RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS WHEN IT IS MORE LIKELY THAN NOT THE POSITION WILL BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY THE TAX AUTHORITIES. THE SCHOOL HAD NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT QUALIFY FOR EITHER RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AS OF JUNE 30, 2023 AND 2022 BASED ON AN ASSESSMENT OF MANY FACTORS INCLUDING EXPERIENCE AND INTERPRETATIONS OF TAX LAWS.
FUNDRAISING EXPENSE DIRECTLY USED TO OFFSET FUNDRAISING REVENUE 97,737. WORK STUDY INCOME 1,002,095. WORK STUDY CONTRIBUTION -1,234,542.
WORK STUDY EXPENSE 384,706. FUNDRAISING EXPENSE DIRECTLY USED TO OFFSET FUNDRAISING REVENUE 97,737.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CORPORATION HAS A BOARD OF DIRECTORS THAT CONSISTS OF NOT MORE THAN TWENTY-FIVE MEMBERS. OFFICERS OF THE CORPORATION INCLUDE THE PRESIDENT, A SECRETARY, AND A TREASURER, EACH OF WHOM ARE ELECTED BY THE BOARD. A CHAIR MAY ALSO BE ELECTED. THE BOARD MAY CONSIST OF UP TO TWENTY-FIVE DIRECTORS. THE TERM OF OFFICE FOR EACH BOARD MEMBER IS THREE YEARS. BOARD MEMBERS MAY SERVE TWO CONSECUTIVE TERMS. THE BOARD IS COMPRISED OF LOCAL MEMBERS. THE CANONICAL ENDORSER IS THE CONGREGATION OF THE PASSION, HOLY CROSS PROVINCE AND MAY HOLD ONE BOARD SEAT. THERE IS ONE SEAT RESERVED FOR A DESIGNATE OF THE CRISTO REY NETWORK. THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE THE PRESIDENT, CHAIR, SECRETARY, TREASURER, AND CHAIRS OF BOARD ESTABLISHED SUB-COMMITTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS DISTRIBUTED TO THE FULL BOARD FOR FINAL REIVEW AND APPROVAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BASE COMPENSATION, NON FIXED COMPENSATION AND TOTAL MAXIMUM COMPENSATION ARE SET BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS IN ADVANCE BASED UPON MARKET CONDITIONS FOR SIMILAR POSITIONS IN THE BIRMINGHAM AREA AND THROUGHOUT THE CRISTO REY NETWORK OF 37 SIMILAR SCHOOLS. THE VARIABLE COMPONENT OF COMPENSATION PLANS IS BASED UPON MEASURABLE OBJECTIVES SET IN ADVANCE AND APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICTS OF INTEREST POLICY, FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND TAX RETURNS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
